title: Remove Quiz section photo entirely

requirements.text: Remove the Quiz section photo entirely so that no quiz-side image is rendered on any breakpoint (mobile or desktop), and remove any related image-loading fallback UI/text from the Quiz section.

quotes: then just remove the quiz photo entirely.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSection.tsx` no longer renders the `QuizImage` component (or any `` for the quiz photo) in either the mobile or desktop layouts.
The Quiz section no longer displays the fallback message "Photo could not be loaded" (or any other quiz-photo placeholder/fallback UI), because the quiz photo is not rendered at all.
Any quiz-photo-specific state/imports (e.g., `imageError` state and `Heart` import used only for the quiz photo fallback) are removed if they are no longer needed.
The Quiz section remains responsive and visually balanced on both mobile and desktop after the image removal, with no layout breakage or excessive empty space.

requirements.text: Update the Quiz section layout to avoid reserving space for the removed side image (e.g., collapse the two-column grid to a single-column layout on large screens) while keeping the quiz content styling and behavior (questions, scoring, celebration animation, results view) unchanged.

quotes: then just remove the quiz photo entirely.

acceptanceCriteria: On large screens, the Quiz section no longer uses a layout that reserves a dedicated right-side column for a photo (no empty sticky column remains).

Quiz flow still functions end-to-end: selecting answers progresses through all 3 questions, celebration animation triggers on correct answers, and results render after question 3 with the existing result messages and "Try Again" reset behavior.
No backend changes are required for this update.

constraints: Do not edit files in `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only Shadcn components); compose them instead.
Do not modify any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not route images through the backend; static assets remain under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (even though the quiz photo will no longer be rendered).
Backend remains a single Motoko actor; no backend work is needed for this change.
nonGoals: Do not change the quiz questions, correct answers, scoring logic, celebration animation behavior, or results messages.
Do not change the Hero section image behavior.
Do not attempt to fix the underlying asset-loading/configuration issue as part of this change; this request is specifically to remove the quiz photo.
